ca.proj.game.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.proj.game.entities.Entity
      • ca.proj.game.entities.Mob
        • ca.proj.game.entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends Mob
    Player.java represents the playable character.     • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Level level,
      int x,
      int y,
      InputHandler input)
        Creates a new Player.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to add the player to
        x - the x position on the level to add the player to
        y - the y position on the level to add the player to
        input - the input handler for the player
